data.title: Cahit Turan, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Cahit Turan stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Cahit Turan - Points

Cahit Turan scores a career high 18 points (2015)

On December 19, 2015, Cahit Turan tied his career high in points in a Turkey - TBL game. That day he scored 18 points in Final Spor Bursa's road win against Akhisar, 49-69. He also had 8 rebounds, 1 assist, 1 steal. He shot 1/2 from two, 4/8 from three, shooting at 50.0% from the field. He also shot 4/4 from the free-throw line.

Cahit Turan - Rebounds

Cahit Turan grabs a career high 8 rebounds (2015)

On December 19, 2015, Cahit Turan tied his career high in rebounds in a Turkey - TBL game. That day he grabbed 8 rebounds in Final Spor Bursa's road win against Akhisar, 49-69. He also had 18 points, 1 assist, 1 steal.

Cahit Turan - Assists

Cahit Turan gives a career high 3 assists (2018)

On November 24, 2018, Cahit Turan tied his career high in assists in a Turkey - TBL game. That day he dished 3 assists in Final Spor Bursa's road loss against Karesi Spor, 92-85. He also had 10 points, 4 rebounds.

Cahit Turan - Steals

Cahit Turan has a career high 2 steals (2012)

On March 24, 2012, Cahit Turan tied his career high in steals in a Turkey - TBL game. That day he reached 2 steals in Denizli Pamukkale's road win against TED Istanbul, 68-71. He also had 14 points, 3 rebounds and 2 assists.

Cahit Turan - Blocks

Cahit Turan blocks a career high 1 shot (2015)

On February 28, 2015, Cahit Turan tied his career high in blocks in a Turkey - TBL game. That day he went for 1 block in Meliksah Universitesi's road win against Ankara DSI, 68-74. He also had 3 points.

Cahit Turan - Efficiency

Cahit Turan records a career high 21 efficiency rating (2015)

On December 19, 2015, Cahit Turan tied his career high in efficiency in a Turkey - TBL game. That day he accomplished 21 efficiency in Final Spor Bursa's road win against Akhisar, 49-69. He also had 18 points, 8 rebounds and 1 assist.
